${modID}:CheeseBoardBoss.NAME: 치즈 보드

Upon pickup gain #b1 Potion Slot. NL All hallway fights now give a bonus potion reward, even special rarity ones. NL #yPotions are #b40% stronger, with their potency increasing by at least #b1 [REMOVE_SPACE]. NL #yPotions grant #b1 Max HP on use.  NL #ySynergy: #y${modID}:Mageblood_Cheese [REMOVE_SPACE].
